content.rendered:
Best Exercise for Women Over 35

BEST EXERCISES FOR 

WOMEN OVER AGE 35

Every woman over the age of 35 should be doing some type of resistance training in an effort to build strength!

Learn More!

Strength Training reduces the risk osteoporosis and bone fractures

Learn More!

It also improves mood, self-esteem, & self confidence

Learn More!

Resistance training helps build lean muscle and lower body fat percentage

Learn More!

There are 6 key functional movement patterns:

Hip extensions
Knee flexion
Vertical pushing
Vertical pulling
Horizontal pushing
Horizontal pulling

Learn More!

Try to do resistance training 3-4 times a week, 20-30 minutes per session.

Learn More!

Swipe up for more details on the types of exercises you should be doing after age 35!

Swipe Up!

excerpt.rendered: The Best Ways to Exercise for Women Over Age 35 [Doctor Explains]. Benefits of resistance training and why women over 35 NEED to be strength training.
